Properties.ProtectedString:
-- SolarCrane
function New(ty) return function(data) local obj = Instance.new(ty) for k, v in pairs(data) do if type(k) == 'number' then v.Parent = obj else if type(v) == 'function' then obj[k]:connect(v) else obj[k] = v end end end return obj end end
function GetRandomFloat(minimum, maximum) local unitRandom = math.random() local interval = maximum - minimum -- there is potential overflow here if the interval is larger than max float if interval <= 0 then print('GetRandomFloat: The range beween minimum and maximum is less than zero.') return nil end local randomNum = (unitRandom * interval) + minimum return randomNum end
function GetRandomUnitVector() return Vector3.new(GetRandomFloat(-1,1), GetRandomFloat(-1,1), GetRandomFloat(-1,1)).unit end
local COOLDOWN_TIME = 3 local MAX_RANGE = 300 local DAMAGE = 70
local COLORS = {'Institutional white', 'Bright red', 'Really blue'}
local PlayersService = Game:GetService('Players') local DebrisService = Game:GetService('Debris')
local Tool = script.Parent local Handle = Tool:WaitForChild('Handle') local MyMouse = nil local MyPlayer = nil local MyCharacter = nil local MyTorso = nil local MyHumanoid = nil local MyMouse = nil local ChargeBall = nil local Particles = {} do local particles_mt = {} particles_mt.__mode = "v" setmetatable(Particles, particles_mt) end local LastActivation = tick()
function CreatePart(from, to, name, color, light) local length = math.min((to-from).magnitude, 5) return New'Part'{ TopSurface = 'Smooth', BottomSurface = 'Smooth', Transparency = 0, CanCollide = false, FormFactor = 'Custom', Size = Vector3.new(1,1,length), light, Name = name, BrickColor = BrickColor.new(color), CFrame = CFrame.new((from + to) / 2, to), Anchored = true, } end
-- Returns the ancestor that contains a Humanoid, if it exists local function FindCharacterAncestor(subject) if subject and subject ~= Workspace then local humanoid = subject:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') if humanoid then return subject, humanoid else return FindCharacterAncestor(subject.Parent) end end return nil end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) -- Add more tags here to customize what tags are available. while humanoid:FindFirstChild('creator') do humanoid:FindFirstChild('creator'):Destroy() end local creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Value = player creatorTag.Name = "creator" DebrisService:AddItem(creatorTag, 1.5) creatorTag.Parent = humanoid end
function ChargeUp(starModel) local chargeSound = Handle:FindFirstChild('Charge')
delay(0.25, function() if chargeSound then chargeSound:Play() end end) local chargeUpBall = New'Part'{ Name = "ChargeUpBall", FormFactor = 'Custom', Size = Vector3.new(1,1,1), TopSurface = 'Smooth', BottomSurface = 'Smooth', BrickColor = BrickColor.new('Institutional white'), Transparency = 0.5, New'SpecialMesh'{ Scale = Vector3.new(0.1,0.1,0.1), MeshType = 'Sphere' }, Parent = MyCharacter } New'ManualWeld'{ Part0 = Handle, Part1 = chargeUpBall, C0 = CFrame.new(0,0,-1.6), Parent = chargeUpBall } DebrisService:AddItem(chargeUpBall, 3) Spawn(function() for starCount = 1, 20 do local star = New'Part'{ FormFactor = 'Custom', Size = Vector3.new(0.4,0.4,0.4), TopSurface = 'Smooth', BottomSurface = 'Smooth', BrickColor = BrickColor.new(COLORS[math.random(1, #COLORS)]), New'PointLight'{ Brightness = 4, Range = 4 }, CanCollide = false, CFrame = CFrame.new(chargeUpBall.CFrame.p + GetRandomFloat(15,20) * GetRandomUnitVector()), Parent = starModel } star.Velocity = (MyTorso.CFrame.p - star.CFrame.p).unit:Cross(CFrame.Angles(GetRandomFloat(0, math.pi*2),0,0) * Vector3.new(0,1,0)) * 50 local propulsion = New'RocketPropulsion'{ Target = chargeUpBall, CartoonFactor = 1, TargetRadius = 2.337, MaxSpeed = 35, TurnD = 1000, TurnP = 400000, ThrustP = 55, MaxTorque = Vector3.new(400000, 400000, 400000), ReachedTarget = function () --print("Reached target") if chargeUpBall and chargeUpBall:FindFirstChild('Mesh') then chargeUpBall.Mesh.Scale = chargeUpBall.Mesh.Scale + Vector3.new(0.1,0.1,0.1) end if star then star:Destroy() end end } for i = 1, 2 do local starClone = star:Clone() starClone.Parent = starModel New'ManualWeld'{ Part0 = star, Part1 = starClone, C0 = CFrame.Angles(GetRandomFloat(math.pi/8, 3 * math.pi/8), GetRandomFloat(math.pi/8, 3 * math.pi/8), GetRandomFloat(math.pi/8, 3 * math.pi/8)), Parent = star } end table.insert(Particles, star) propulsion.Parent = star propulsion:Fire() wait(0.05) end end) --wait(0.5) return chargeUpBall end
function Shoot() local starModel = New'Model'{ Name = "StarModel", Parent = Workspace } DebrisService:AddItem(starModel, 8) ChargeBall = ChargeUp(starModel) --MyMouse.TargetFilter = starModel wait(1) local shootSound = Handle:FindFirstChild('Shoot') if shootSound then shootSound:Play() end ChargeBall.Mesh.Changed:connect(function(prop) if ChargeBall and ChargeBall:FindFirstChild('Mesh') then -- and #Particles == 0 then -- Rainbow code! local hitObj, hitPos = Workspace:FindPartOnRayWithIgnoreList(Ray.new(ChargeBall.CFrame.p,(MyHumanoid.TargetPoint - ChargeBall.CFrame.p).unit * MAX_RANGE), {MyCharacter, starModel, rayModel})--, starModel}) local hitChar = FindCharacterAncestor(hitObj) if hitChar and hitChar:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') then TagHumanoid(hitChar.Humanoid, MyPlayer) hitChar.Humanoid:TakeDamage(DAMAGE) end local ray if hitPos then ray = Ray.new(ChargeBall.CFrame.p, hitPos - ChargeBall.CFrame.p) else ray = Ray.new(ChargeBall.CFrame.p, (MyHumanoid.TargetPoint - ChargeBall.CFrame.p).unit * MAX_RANGE) end local stepDir = ray.Direction.unit local rayModel = New'Model'{ Name = 'RayModel', Parent = Workspace } DebrisService:AddItem(rayModel, 0.5) for i = 0, ray.Direction.magnitude / 5 do local whiteRay = CreatePart(ray.Origin + stepDir*i*5 - Vector3.new(0,1,0), ray.Origin + stepDir*(i+1)*5 - Vector3.new(0,1,0), 'White', 'Institutional white', New'PointLight'{ Brightness = 0.5, Range = 8, Color = Color3.new(255,255,255), }) local redRay = CreatePart((ray.Origin + stepDir*i*5), (ray.Origin + stepDir*(i+1)*5), 'Red', 'Bright red', New'PointLight'{ Brightness = 4, Range = 8, Color = Color3.new(255,0,0), }) local blueRay = CreatePart((ray.Origin + stepDir*i*5) - Vector3.new(0,2,0), (ray.Origin + stepDir*(i+1)*5) - Vector3.new(0,2,0), 'Blue', 'Really blue', New'PointLight'{ Brightness = 4, Range = 8, Color = Color3.new(0,0,255), }) whiteRay.Parent = rayModel redRay.Parent = rayModel blueRay.Parent = rayModel end ChargeBall:Destroy() ChargeBall = nil for i = 1, 10 do wait(0.12) for _, child in pairs(starModel:GetChildren()) do if child:IsA('BasePart') then child.Transparency = math.min(1, child.Transparency + 0.1) if child.Transparency == 1 then child:Destroy() end end end end end end) end
function CanShoot() return tick() - LastActivation > COOLDOWN_TIME and not ChargeBall and MyCharacter and MyCharacter:FindFirstChild('Right Shoulder', true) and MyHumanoid and MyHumanoid.Health > 0 end
function OnActivated() if CanShoot() then Tool.Enabled = false delay(COOLDOWN_TIME, function() Tool.Enabled = true end) LastActivation = tick() Shoot() end end
function OnEquipped(mouse) MyCharacter = Tool.Parent MyPlayer = PlayersService:GetPlayerFromCharacter(MyCharacter) MyHumanoid = MyCharacter:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') MyTorso = MyCharacter:FindFirstChild('Torso') MyMouse = MyPlayer:GetMouse() end
function OnUnequipped() local shootSound = Handle:FindFirstChild('Shoot') if shootSound then shootSound:Stop() end local chargeSound = Handle:FindFirstChild('Charge') if chargeSound then chargeSound:Stop() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(OnActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(OnUnequipped)

local MOUSE_ICON = 'rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png' local RELOADING_ICON = 'rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png'
local Tool = script.Parent
local Mouse = nil
local function UpdateIcon() Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and MOUSE_ICON or RELOADING_ICON end
local function OnEquipped(mouse) Mouse = mouse UpdateIcon() end
local function OnChanged(property) if property == 'Enabled' then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)
